overview: Checking in to the Hostel, beautiful young twink Lucas Phelps has no idea just how much fun he’s going to have.  Starting with giant dicked Kayden Gray swinging his perfectly formed dick in his face, down to catching two guys having a loose holed fuck on his bed after a long night out – there’s nothing quite like staying at the Hook-Up Hostel.  Meeting hung tattooed twinks for an ass-splitting time to waking up all alone but still getting his ass stretched, Lucas and all other backpackers have the best time here, knowing they are here for sex more than sightseeing, but we’re given the best sights of all!
title: The Hook-Up Hostel
